Articles.Content:
You should probably be asking this in the RVE thread itself, or at least in the Add-on Discussions part of the forum.

Anyway, RVE is not officially updated for 1.1.2 so it is not supposed to work with it.

I tried installing plain old RSS today, but I ended up playing Kerbal Space PowerPoint. I can't imagine what RVE would do to it. I don't know if it's the mod combination or if my rig is just too old or what.

As stated above, RVE is not up to date yet. It will be awesome when it is* **

*for those who know how to set it up right with all the other mods needed.

**only when it's not glitching out.

5 minutes ago, cubinator said:

I tried installing plain old RSS today, but I ended up playing Kerbal Space PowerPoint. I can't imagine what RVE would do to it. I don't know if it's the mod combination or if my rig is just too old or what.

As stated above, RVE is not up to date yet. It will be awesome when it is* **

*for those who know how to set it up right with all the other mods needed.

**only when it's not glitching out.

I have RSS with 91 mods, runs like a screaming horse around 40-60 FPS. What is your specs?
Its thread would be the place to check.
